page.title: 13Tourism in Arundel
page.content: People mainly come to Arundel for its {castle, the lovely river, country {parks and antiques.}The castle receives about 185,000 visitors each year. Arundel Park is set in very attractive coutriside including Swanbourne Lake which is very popular, having boating and wildfowl, some of which have come from the nearby Trust. The town is full of picturesque{ {historic buildings}and the shops rely mainly on tourism, which brings employment to the area. Last year about 10,000 people{hired boats}to go on the river. The{museums}(one a heritage centre the other a Toy and Military Curiosities museum) receive about 14,000 visitors a year. Americans are frequent visitors to the town.
